0: AN ACT REGULATING THE SALE OF MOTOR VEHICLES IN METRO MANILA, METRO CEBU, METRO DAVAO AND OTHER HIGHLY URBANIZED CITIES BY REQUIRING A PROOF-OF-PARKING SPACE OR FACILITY FROM MOTOR VEHICLE BUYERS AS A PRE-REQUISITE FOR THE PURCHASE OF A MOTOR VEHICLE AND REGISTRATION WITH THE LAND TRANSPORTATION OFFICE
